Configuring Build Specifications

When you create a build specification, you can configure advanced features for each build specification type to customize the build. To modify the properties of an existing build specification, right-click the build specification in the Project Explorer window and select Properties from the shortcut menu. You can use the pages of the build specification properties dialog box to configure advanced settings for the application.

Related Topics

The following topics discuss the steps to help you configure your build specifications:

  • Configuring Run-Time Languages for Applications and Shared Libraries
  • Copying LabVIEW Work Environment Options
  • Executing a VI before or after a Build
